div.p: E.S., P.H. and H.L.-C. initiated the experiment and all authors contributed to its final design. W.J.v.Z., A.T., H.V., T.H., P.K., B.L.B., F.H. and D.M.-D. implemented the scenarios and provided model output data. K.C., J.C.D., S.F., P.H., H.L.-C., H.v.M., A.P. and K.W. provided feedback to the manuscript text. W.J.v.Z. prepared the figures. E.S. and H.V. wrote the paper and all authors contributed to the analysis.
